name: Process as Product
metadata:
{"name": "Process as Product 1/11", "description": "- What if a we lived in a world where artists were compensated for their creative processes as well as for their final products ?

- What if the chaotic valleys of creative catharsis were valued as equal to the pristine views of peak creative performance ? 

This is the eth0s of the experiment that Cxy and I have been undergoing for the past few months. 

Ib�ve been minting weekly artifacts of my creative process :: demos, song notes, bts videosb�& and inviting my audience to get a view I might not otherwise have offered. [ link :: https://zez.am/forrestmortifeeNFTs ]

In this video, I explain the mindset behind our experimentations, and hint at visions for the evolution of my audience's NFT discovery process. 

Am I in the trenches of chaotic catharsis myself this week? Yes, I'd say so. Is that stopping me from documenting my imperfect, private process? No tis not. Wish I could be more chipper with you in this video, but I'm feeling tender, so gentleness was on the docket instead.

Sending blessings, as always ~
Forrest", "image": "ipfs://bafybeids6ghcqore7mnaaxtfq7qz5hpx3eeapzuuz76lexicagrqdieowq", "animation_url": "ipfs://bafybeia6um63mhaz2yhi4kgbx62mrzfpjly3csvy2x5mhjra24yufjjqei", "properties": {"number": 1, "name": "Process as Product"}}
